advanced_shielding.name: Advanced Shielding
advanced_shielding.description: Adds +1 to a starship’s Shield Strength. May be purchased up to 3 times.

advanced_targeting_system.name: Advanced Targeting System
advanced_targeting_system.description: Adds +1 to a starship’s Targeting. May be purchased up to 3 times.

automated_weapons.name: Automated Weapons
automated_weapons.description: Allows one of a starship’s attacks to operate without a crew. Base Hit Bonus +0. Purchase once per weapon.

cloaking_device.name: Cloaking Device
cloaking_device.description: Allows the starship to become invisible. Breaks when attacking or activating shields.

ftl_drive.name: Faster-Than-Light (FTL) Drive
ftl_drive.description: Enables galactic travel. Takes 5 rounds to activate once clear of planetary gravity.

high_yield_thrusters.name: High-Yield Thrusters
high_yield_thrusters.description: Adds +1 to a starship’s Movement. May be purchased up to 3 times.

ion_charge.name: Ion Charge
ion_charge.description: Adds a weapon that deals 2d6 damage and inflicts -1 Movement to the target for the next round.

proton_missiles.name: Proton Missiles
proton_missiles.description: Adds a weapon that deals 8d6 damage. Does no damage to ships with Shield Strength ≥ 1.

reinforced_hull.name: Reinforced Hull
reinforced_hull.description: Adds -1 [+1] to a starship’s Armor Class. May be purchased up to 3 times.

tractor_beam.name: Tractor Beam
tractor_beam.description: Stops enemy movement on failed Save. Pulls enemy closer. +2 To-Hit for attacker. Only for large transports/dreadnoughts.

shield_capacitor.name: Shield Capacitor
shield_capacitor.description: Reduces Shield Strength regeneration interval by 1 round. May be purchased up to 3 times.
